sentences.sentence: Many skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.translation: 许多滑雪者乐于放弃暑假去滑雪。

sentences.sentence: Or else he would forego his mortal nature.
sentences.translation: 不然他就失去了凡人的本性。

sentences.sentence: Of course, that does not mean you should forego security!
sentences.translation: 当然，这并不意味着您应该放弃安全性！
